name: Splash Umbrella
description:
Color the ground with the ink rain that’s falling over your head.
This is a game where you compete for occupancy.
By moving and swinging your umbrella around, you can beat your enemies, activate the gimmicks, and apply as much ink as you can onto the ground.

--Game Description--
* Swipe the player towards the direction you want to move.
* Lift your finger to swing the umbrella and wet the ink extensively.
* Swing the umbrella around to activate the gimmicks and attack your approaching enemies.
* If you get a giant pill, your player will become huge for a certain period.
* You’ll have to compete with others (10 players in total) for ink occupancy.

Activating the prepared gimmicks will help you apply ink over a wide range. By doing that before being robbed by the enemies, you can gain advantages in this game.

A thrilling game awaits you now!
So, try your best and aim for 1st place!
